DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect repeat dose solabegron oxybutynin take alone together
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Test The Interaction Two Medications Treatment Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male & female age 1865 ; Body weight > 50kg ; BMI 1932 ; Signed date informed consent ; QTc Interval < 450 msec ; Resting blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg HR > 100 screening ; History drug allergy allergy , opinion PI , contraindicate participation ; Positive urine drug , alcohol serum pregnancy test screen prior dosing ; Positive HIV , Hepatitis B , C screening ; use medication ( except acetaminophen ) vitamins herbal supplement within 7 day 5 half life prior dose study ; history urinary retention , gastric retention , sever gastrointestinal motility condition , uncontrolled narrowangle glaucoma risk condition ; history chronic constipation and/or regular laxative use ; donation 500mL blood within 56 day prior dose ; clinically relevant abnormality identify screen process medical condition circumstance make subject unsuitable participation base Investigators assessment
